c74object.name: fl.chop~
c74object.digest: Chops input frames into equally sized output frames.
c74object.description: The size can be set in samples, or as a ratio of the length of the input frame.

entry.name: 1. /size [double]
entry.description: Sets the size of the output frames.

entry.name: 2. /units [enum]
entry.description:
Sets units for the chop size (samples or ratio of the input length [0-1]).
[0] - samples [1] - ratios
